results.description: Real Madrid are stunned by La Liga's bottom club Rayo Vallecano, who keep their slim hopes of survival alive.
results.shortTitle: Real Madrid lose to bottom side Rayo
results.title: Rayo Vallecano 1-0 Real Madrid: La Liga giants lose to bottom side

results.description: Real Madrid make the short trip to Rayo Vallecano in La Liga - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Rayo Vallecano v Real Madrid - bottom club win 1-0
results.title: Rayo Vallecano v Real Madrid live in La Liga

results.description: Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho is backed by team-mate Gerard Pique after the midfielder was jeered by home fans during the win over Rayo Vallecano.
results.shortTitle: Pique backs Coutinho after fan jeers
results.title: Barcelona 3-1 Rayo Vallecano: Philippe Coutinho backed by Gerard Pique after jeers

results.description: Reigning Spanish champions Barcelona host Rayo Vallecano in La Liga - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona v Rayo Vallecano - champions come from behind to win
results.title: Barcelona v Rayo Vallecano live in La Liga

results.description: Think of football in Madrid and the mind turns to Real and Atletico, but the city possesses three more top-flight clubs, whose quirks capture the essence of its footballing scene.
results.shortTitle: Football in Madrid – but not as you know it
results.title: Real and Atletico dominate in Madrid – but what about the city’s other La Liga teams?

results.description: Atletico Madrid move above city rivals Real into second place in La Liga after Antoine Griezmann's goal sees off Rayo Vallecano.
results.shortTitle: Griezmann goal takes Atletico above Real
results.title: Rayo Vallecano 0-1 Atletico Madrid: Antoine Griezmann goal takes Atletico above Real Madrid

results.description: Nigeria's Uche Agbo says he will not sacrifice his football ambition for money at this stage of his career after rejecting a move to China.
results.title: Nigeria's Uche Agbo 'football more important than cash'

results.description: Barcelona secures two late goals to beat struggling Rayo Vallecano in a remarkable game and extend their lead at the top of La Liga.
results.shortTitle: Barca stun Rayo with late comeback
results.title: Rayo Vallecano 2-3 Barcelona: Champions stun Rayo with late comeback

results.description: Barcelona travel to Rayo Vallecano in La Liga and Juventus host Cagliari in Serie A - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Late drama as Barcelona beat Rayo
results.title: European live: Rayo Vallecano v Barcelona plus Juventus v Cagliari updates

results.description: Bebe and Gael Kakuta played in Premier League title-winning sides without earning a medal - can you name the others in their squads?
results.shortTitle: Name the title winners without a medal
results.title: Quiz: Name the Premier League title winners who missed medal cut-off

results.description: La Liga side Rayo Vallecano sign Stoke City midfielder Giannelli Imbula on a season-long loan deal.
results.shortTitle: Stoke's Imbula joins Vallecano on loan
results.title: Giannelli Imbula: Stoke City midfielder joins Rayo Vallecano on season-long loan

results.description: Rayo Vallecano's ground is closed for safety reasons until at least mid-October after complaints from fans of the La Liga club.
results.shortTitle: Vallecano ground shut for safety reasons
results.title: Rayo Vallecano ground closed until at least mid-October after fan complaints

results.description: Antoine Griezmann says he wants to take Atletico Madrid "to the highest I can" after scoring the only goal against Rayo Vallecano.
results.title: Atletico Madrid 1-0 Rayo Vallecano: Antoine Griezmann scores winner

results.description: Andre Silva scores a hat-trick on his La Liga debut as Sevilla win comfortably at Rayo Vallecano.
results.title: Rayo Vallecano 1-4 Sevilla: Andre Silva scores hat-trick on La Liga debut

results.description: Swansea City complete the signing of Wales and Rangers defender Declan John on a three-year-deal.
results.title: Declan John: Swansea City sign Rangers defender on three-year deal
